BIO

I am a 2nd-year Computer Science student at the University of Leicester, United Kingdom. I have knowledge in HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Java, Spring Boot, MySQL and Agile Scrum methodology. Since I am aspiring to become a professional Full Stack Developer, alongside my studies, I am also working on personal projects to showcase my skills and abilities. Furthermore, I am constantly building up my knowledge in Front End and Back End Development, currently focusing on React and Node.js.
